actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to designate the Ala Kahakai Trail in the State of Hawaii as a route to study for consideration for designation as a national trail.

summary.text: Amends the National Trails System Act to designate the Ala Kahakai Trail in Hawaii for study for designation as a national scenic trail.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to designate the Ala Kahakai Trail in the State of Hawaii as a route to study for consideration for designation as a national trail.
